description.french: Vous vous êtes fait poursuivre par Majima.
description.italian: Majima ti ha inseguito.
description.spanish: Te ha perseguido Majima.
description.schinese: 第一次在街上被真岛追赶
description.tchinese: 首次在街頭被真島追趕
description.japanese: 街で初めて真島に追いかけられた

description.english: Thug Majima forced his way into a fight.
description.german: Schläger-Majima hat sich in einen Kampf eingemischt.

description.italian: Majima si è infilato in un combattimento.
description.spanish: Majima matón te ha obligado a pelear.
description.schinese: 在街上干架时被空手的真岛闯入
description.tchinese: 在街頭幹架時碰見空手的真島跑來湊熱鬧
description.russian: Головорез Мадзима заставил вас драться с ним.
description.japanese: 街のケンカで素手の真島が乱入してきた
description.latam: Majima matón te obligó a pelear.

displayName.german: Jetzt kommt Schwung in die Sache!
displayName.italian: Batti con tutta la tua forza!

description.english: Slugger Majima forced his way into a fight.

description.english: The Mad Dog of Shimano forced his way into a fight.
